name: shop-and-chop
description: Smart meal planner and shopping list generator - Shop smart, chop smarter

scripts.build: npm run build:client && npm run build:server
scripts.test: npm run test:client && npm run test:server
scripts.setup: npm install && cd client && npm install && cd ../server && npm install
scripts.db:setup: cd server && npx prisma generate && npx prisma db push && npx prisma db seed
scripts.db:reset: cd server && npx prisma db push --force-reset && npx prisma db seed
